name: audiobookrequest
tagline: A request management system for handling audiobook additions to media libraries
description: AudioBookRequest is a self-hosted system to manage audiobook requests for media servers. It allows users to request titles and admins to track library additions for services like Jellyfin.

features.title: Request Management
features.description: Users can request audiobooks for your library. Community-driven

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Works with Jellyfin and similar platforms. Seamless integration

features.title: User Interface
features.description: Simple request submission for library users. Easy participation

features.title: Library Management
features.description: Track additions to your audiobook collection. Complete catalog

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own request system. Complete control

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alert users when requests are fulfilled. Keep users informed
